item.title: Transforming by item
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:7, topic:261184”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=344914.msg2660505#msg2660505 date=1234144104]

	}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == false){

That really isn’t necessary. You just have to do this:

} else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] != 4657) {

And I don’t think you need npcid2, just one.
[/quote]

Then if he unequips the ring or switches to another ring then it won’t switch him back to normal.[/quote]Yes it will. != is saying that if the ring doesn’t equal 4657 then it npcid = 0.

dedin isn’t even online anymore though.

Read full topic

item.title: Transforming by item
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:7, topic:261184”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=344914.msg2660505#msg2660505 date=1234144104]

	}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == false){

That really isn’t necessary. You just have to do this:

} else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] != 4657) {

And I don’t think you need npcid2, just one.
[/quote]

Then if he unequips the ring or switches to another ring then it won’t switch him back to normal.[/quote]

Yes it will.

! = not

So if it is NOT the ring, it will switch back to normal.

Read full topic

item.title: Transforming by item
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:6, topic:261184”][quote author=dedin321 link=topic=344914.msg2660281#msg2660281 date=1234135966]

	}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == false){

[/quote]

That really isn’t necessary. You just have to do this:

} else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] != 4657) {

And I don’t think you need npcid2, just one.[/quote]

Then if he unequips the ring or switches to another ring then it won’t switch him back to normal.

Read full topic

item.title: Transforming by item
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

dedin321:

}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == false){

That really isn’t necessary. You just have to do this:

} else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] != 4657) {

And I don’t think you need npcid2, just one.

Read full topic

item.title: Transforming by item
item.dc:creator: @dedin321 dedin321
item.description:
@dedin321 wrote:

i need help i want to make it so if u wear something it turns you into a npc tryed to do this:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657){
npcId = 1614;
npcId2 = 1614;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 4657 == false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

but it still doesnt work… plz help ive looked around and cant find anything :eek:

Read full topic
